title: Most commonly reported types of cyber crime 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Cyber Incidents in the x axis and Number of complaints in the y axis.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
There is a difference of 49547.0 between the maximum Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and minimum Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of complaints for 11 number of Cyber Incidentss.
The Number of complaints is highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cyber Incidents in the x axis and Number of complaints in the y axis.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.

max_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Cyber Incidents, and Number of complaints in each Cyber Incidents on the y axis.
The maximum Number of complaints 65116.0 is found at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and the minimum is found at Spoofing where Number of complaints is 15569.0.
Second maximum Number of complaints is found at Cyber Incidents .
The difference of Number of complaints between the highest and lowest Cyber Incidents is 49547.0.

Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery is higher than any other Cyber Incidentss with value 65116.0, followed by , and Personal data breach. Down to Cyber Incidents Spoofing with the lowest value 15569.0.
The lowest value 15569.0 at Spoofing is almost 2.13 times smaller than the average value 30505.36.
